site_name: St Mary With St Nicholas Church Hall
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission PP/2013/2200 (dated 18/09/2013) for the redevelopment of site to provide a three storey building with a replacement church and meeting rooms at ground floor level (D1 use), together with 4 x 2 bed flats, and 6 x 1 bed flats at first and second floor level, 1 x 2 storey 4 bed vicarage located in the northeast corner of the site, a two storey terrace containing  2 x 3 bed  houses & 1 x 2 bed house in the northern part of the site, and a two storey terrace of 4 x 3 bed houses fronting Federal Road (10 affordable units and 8 private market units), a new vehicular access in the central part of the site, 27 car parking spaces, including 3 disabled bays, refuse bay and landscaping (following the demolition of the existing buildings) (Amendment to alter openings on the north, south and east elevations, addition of photovoltaic panels on the east and west elevation rooflopes and increase in height of the single storey element).
